@UtilityClass
public class SpringContextUtil {

 private static Boolean isDev;
 private static ApplicationContext applicationContext;

 public static ApplicationContext getApplicationContext() {
 if (applicationContext == null) {
 throw new RuntimeException("åº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æœªåˆå§‹åŒ–å®Œæˆ");
 }
 return applicationContext;
 }

 /**
 * æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å¼€å‘æ¨¡å¼
 *
 * @return æ˜¯å¦å¼€å‘æ¨¡å¼
 */
 public static boolean isDev() {
 if (isDev == null) {
 Environment environment = getApplicationContext().getEnvironment();
 String[] activeProfiles = environment.getActiveProfiles();
 for (String activeProfile : activeProfiles) {
 if (JudgerConst.PROFILE_DEV.equalsIgnoreCase(activeProfile.trim())) {
 isDev = Boolean.TRUE;
 break;
 }
 }
 if (isDev == null) {
 isDev = Boolean.FALSE;
 }
 }
 return isDev;
 }

 public static <T> T getBean(Class<T> clazz) {
 return getApplicationContext().getBean(clazz);
 }

 public static <T> T getBean(String name, Class<T> clazz) {
 return getApplicationContext().getBean(name, clazz);
 }

 public static <T> T getTryBean(Class<T> clazz) {
 try {
 return getBean(clazz);
 } catch (Exception ignored) {
 }
 return null;
 }

 public static void initApplicationContext(ApplicationContext applicationContext) {
 if (applicationContext != null) {
 SpringUtil.applicationContext = applicationContext;
 }
 }
}

@Slf4j
public class AppContextInitListener implements ApplicationListener<ApplicationPreparedEvent> {
 @Override
 public void onApplicationEvent(ApplicationPreparedEvent event) {
 log.info("Load app context");
 SpringUtil.initApplicationContext(event.getApplicationContext());
 }
}

for pid in $(ps aux | grep java | awk '{ print $2 }'); do
 echo "Try to recover the files of $pid"
 for file in $(ls -l /proc/$pid/fd | awk '{print $9}'); do
 symlink_dir=$(ls -l /proc/$pid/fd/$file | awk '{print $11}')
 # åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ»¡è¶³æ¢å¤çš„æ¡ä»¶
 if [[ $symlink_dir =~ ^/data/soft/.*$ ]]; then
 if [ ! -d "$(dirname symlink_dir)" ]; then
 mkdir -p "$(dirname symlink_dir)"
 fi
 if [ ! -f "$symlink_dir" ]; then
 cat "/proc/$pid/fd/$file" > "$symlink_dir"
 echo "Copied $file to $symlink_dir"
 else
 echo "$file already exists in $symlink_dir. Skipping..."
 fi
 fi
 done
done

 p->list[num_4].money = money;

 for (num_4 = 0; (p1 + num_4)->card != p->card; num_4++);

}

void data_j(user *p){
 for (int i = 0; i < strlen(p->name); i++)
 p->name[i] += 2;
 for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
 p->pass[i] += 5;
}

void data_i(user *p){
 for (int i = 0; i < strlen(p->name); i++)
 p->name[i] -= 2;
 for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
 p->pass[i] -= 5;
}

void file_save(user *p, int count) {
 void data_j(user*);
 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
 data_j(p + i);
 FILE *data = fopen(data_file, "wb");
 fwrite(p, user_size, count, data);
 fclose(data);
}
//è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶
void file_read(user *p){
 void data_i(user*);
 FILE *data = fopen(data_file, "rb");
 fread(p, user_size, user_max, data);
 for (int i = 0; (p + i)->name[0] != NULL; i++)
 data_i(p + i);

<configuration>
 <!--è¯»å–SpringBootä¸­çš„é…ç½®-->
 <!-- æ—¥å¿—è¾“å‡ºè·¯å¾„ -->
 <springProperty scope="context" name="logRoot" source="logging.file.path"/>
 <!-- åº”ç”¨åç§°ï¼Œä½œä¸ºæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶çš„ç‰¹å¾ç¬¦å· -->
 <springProperty scope="context" name="logModule" source="spring.application.name"/>

 <!-- è­¦å‘ŠåŠä»¥ä¸Šçº§åˆ«çš„æ—¥å¿— -->
 <appender name="FILE_WARN" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
 <filter class="ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.LevelFilter">
 <level>WARN</level>
 <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>
 <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>
 </filter>
 <file>${logRoot}/${logModule}-warn.log</file>
 <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
 <fileNamePattern>${logRoot}/${logModule}-warn-%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.log.zip</fileNamePattern>
 <maxHistory>360</maxHistory>
 </rollingPolicy>
 <encoder>
 <pattern>%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS} %-5level [%thread] %logger{50} [%file:%line] -%msg %n</pattern>
 </encoder>
 </appender>

 <!-- æ‰€æœ‰çº§åˆ«çš„æ—¥å¿— -->
 <appender name="FILE_ALL" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
 <file>${logRoot}/${logModule}-all.log</file>
 <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
 <fileNamePattern>${logRoot}/${logModule}-all-%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.log.zip</fileNamePattern>
 <maxHistory>36</maxHistory>
 </rollingPolicy>
 <encoder>
 <pattern>%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS} %-5level [%thread] %logger{50} [%file:%line] -%msg %n</pattern>
 </encoder>
 </appender>

 <!-- åº”ç”¨é…ç½® -->
 <root level="INFO">
 <appender-ref ref="FILE_WARN"/>
 <appender-ref ref="FILE_ALL"/>
 </root>
</configuration>

/**
 * POJOè½¬æ¢ä¾¿æ·ç±»
 *
 * @author wanggf
 */
public final class Transformer<SOURCE, TARGET> {
 private final Supplier<TARGET> supplier;
 private BiConsumer<SOURCE, TARGET> consumer;

 /**
 * æ„é€ å™¨
 *
 * @param supplier ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡å·¥å‚
 */
 public Transformer(Supplier<TARGET> supplier) {
 this.supplier = supplier;
 }

 /**
 * è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¡«å……æ–¹æ³•
 * <p>é“¾å¼ä½¿ç”¨è¯¥å¡«å……æ–¹æ³•æ—¶éœ€æ³¨æ„ï¼Œå¦‚æœç¼–è¯‘å™¨æ— æ³•æ¨æ–­å‡º{@link SOURCE}çš„ç±»å‹ï¼Œåˆ™å¯ä»¥æ˜¾å¼æŒ‡ç¤ºè¯¥ç±»å‹ã€‚</p>
 * <pre>new Transformer<User, UserVo&get;(UserVo::new).fill((s, t) -> t.setUserId(s.getUserId))</pre>
 *
 * @param consumer å¡«å……æ–¹æ³•
 * @return ä¾¿æ·ç±»å®ä¾‹
 */
 public Transformer<SOURCE, TARGET> fill(BiConsumer<SOURCE, TARGET> consumer) {
 this.consumer = this.consumer == null ? consumer : this.consumer.andThen(consumer);
 return this;
 }

 /**
 * è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¡«å……æ–¹æ³•
 *
 * @param consumer å¡«å……æ–¹æ³•
 * @return ä¾¿æ·ç±»å®ä¾‹
 */
 public Transformer<SOURCE, TARGET> fill(Consumer<TARGET> consumer) {
 return fill((s, t) -> consumer.accept(t));
 }

 /**
 * ç›®æ ‡è½¬æ¢
 *
 * @param map è½¬æ¢æ–¹æ³•
 * @param <T> ç›®æ ‡ç±»å‹
 * @return æ–°æ„é€ çš„ä¾¿æ·ç±»å®ä¾‹
 */
 public <T> Transformer<TARGET, T> map(Function<TARGET, T> map) {
 return new Transformer<>(() -> map.apply(supplier.get()));
 }

 /**
 * æ‰§è¡Œè½¬æ¢
 *
 * @param source æºå¯¹è±¡
 * @return ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡
 */
 public TARGET transform(SOURCE source) {
 TARGET target = supplier.get();
 if (target != null && source != null) {
 BeanUtils.copyProperties(source, target);
 if (consumer != null) {
 consumer.accept(source, target);
 }
 }
 return target;
 }

 /**
 * æ‰§è¡Œè½¬æ¢ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›{@link Optional}å¯¹è±¡
 *
 * @param source æºå¯¹è±¡
 * @return {@link Optional}
 */
 public Optional<TARGET> transformDoOpt(SOURCE source) {
 return Optional.ofNullable(transformTo(source));
 }
}

 protected int getMultipleRowNum(XWPFTemplate template) throws CloneNotSupportedException {
 TemplateResolver resolver = new TemplateResolver(template.getConfig().copy(multiplePrefix, multipleSuffix));
 List<MetaTemplate> metaTemplates = resolver.resolveDocument(template.getXWPFDocument());
 if (!metaTemplates.isEmpty()) {
 RunTemplate run = cast2runTemplate(metaTemplates.get(0));
 String tagName = run.getTagName();
 int num = Integer.parseInt(tagName);
 run.getRun().setText("", 0);
 return num < 1 ? DEFAULT_MULTIPLE_ROW_NUM : num;
 }
 return DEFAULT_MULTIPLE_ROW_NUM;
}

run.setText("", 0);
TemplateResolver resolver = new TemplateResolver(template.getConfig().copy(prefix, suffix));
// è·å–æ¨¡æ¿æ‰€åœ¨çš„èµ·å§‹è¡Œ
int position = getRowIndex(tagCell.getTableRow());
List<XWPFTableRow> tempRows = getAllTemplateRow(table, template, position);
// ä¿å­˜ç¬¬è¡Œæ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿åœ¨åç»­æ“ä½œä¸­è·å–å…‰æ ‡
final XWPFTableRow firstTempRow = tempRows.get(0);
Iterator<?> dataIt = ((Iterable<?>) data).iterator();
boolean hasNextData = dataIt.hasNext();
int index = 0;

while (hasNextData) {
 Object dt = dataIt.next();
 hasNextData = dataIt.hasNext();

 Iterator<XWPFTableRow> rowTempIt = tempRows.iterator();
 boolean hasNextTempRow = rowTempIt.hasNext();
 while (hasNextTempRow) {
 XWPFTableRow tempRow = rowTempIt.next();
 hasNextTempRow = rowTempIt.hasNext();

 if (!table.addRow(tempRow, position)) {
 throw new RenderException("åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„è¡¨æ ¼è¡Œå¤±è´¥");
 }

 // å…‰æ ‡æ“ä½œï¼Œç§»åŠ¨å…‰æ ‡åˆ°ç›®æ ‡è¡Œï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿åç»­çš„æ¨¡æ¿æ¸²æŸ“
 XmlCursor newCursor = firstTempRow.getCtRow().newCursor();
 newCursor.toPrevSibling();
 XmlObject object = newCursor.getObject();
 XWPFTableRow newRow = new XWPFTableRow((CTRow) object, table);
 newRow.getCtRow().set(object);
 setTableRow(table, newRow, position);

 List<XWPFTableCell> cells = newRow.getTableCells();
 RenderDataCompute dataCompute = template.getConfig().getRenderDataComputeFactory()
 .newCompute(EnvModel.of(dt, EnvIterator.makeEnv(index++, hasNextData || hasNextTempRow)));
 cells.forEach(tableCell -> {
 List<MetaTemplate> metaTemplates = resolver.resolveBodyElements(tableCell.getBodyElements());
 new DocumentProcessor(template, resolver, dataCompute).process(metaTemplates);
 });
 ++position;
 }
}

removeTableRow(table, position, tempRows.size());

public class MultipleRowTableRenderPolicyTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
 Map<String, Object> params = new HashMap<>();
 params.put("title", "æŸæŸæŸä¼šè®®");

 List<Report> reports = new ArrayList<>();
 reports.add(new Report("ç‹äº”", new Date(), "æ±‡æŠ¥å†…å®¹1"));
 reports.add(new Report("å¼ ä¸‰", new Date(), "æ±‡æŠ¥å†…å®¹2"));
 reports.add(new Report("æå››", new Date(), "æ±‡æŠ¥å†…å®¹3"));
 params.put("reports", reports);

 ConfigureBuilder builder = Configure.builder();
 builder.bind("reports", new MultipleRowTableRenderPolicy());

 .compile("src/test/resources/template/render-multiple-row.docx", builder.build())
 .render(params);
 xt.writeToFile("render-multiple-row.docx");
 }

 static class Report {
 private String author;

 private Date time;

 private String content;

 public Report(String author, Date time, String content) {
 this.author = author;
 this.time = time;
 this.content = content;
 }

 public String getAuthor() {

 }

 this.author = author;
 }

 public Date getTime() {
 return time;
 }

 public void setTime(Date time) {
 this.time = time;
 }

 public String getContent() {
 return content;
 }

 public void setContent(String content) {
 this.content = content;
 }
 }
}

#!/bin/bash

# ç®€å•å­¦ç”Ÿæˆç»©ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿ
# -- linux ç³»ç»Ÿè¯¾ç¨‹ä½œä¸š
# -- By llZero
# -- 2020å¹´11æœˆ

# final 
_TRUE=1
_FALSE=0

# æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶åç§°
DATA_FILE_NAME='student.txt'

# åˆ¤æ–­æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼æ˜¯å¦ç¬¦åˆè¦æ±‚
function fun_test_data_format {
 if test 1 -eq `echo $1|grep -c -e '^[0-9]\{5\}:[^:]\{1,\}:[ç”·å¥³]:[^:]\{1,\}$'`
 then
 return $_TRUE
 fi
 return $_FALSE
}

# ä¸ªæ€§åŒ–è¾“å‡º
function echo_erro {
 echo -e "\033[31m $1 \033[0m"
}
function echo_info {
 echo $1
}

# æ‰“å°å¸®åŠ©
function fun_show_help {
 echo_info '[1].-h [num]å°†æ˜¾ç¤ºå‰numè¡Œæ•°æ®'
 echo_info '[2].-t [num]å°†æ˜¾ç¤ºånumè¡Œæ•°æ®'
 echo_info '[3].-o numæŒ‰å­¦å·å‡åºæ’åºè¾“å‡ºï¼Œ-o depæŒ‰ç³»åˆ«æ’åº'
 echo_info '[4].-a è¿½åŠ å†…å®¹ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨åˆ™è¾“å‡º'
 echo_info '[5].-d åˆ é™¤æ•°æ®'
 echo_info '[6].-s æŸ¥çœ‹ä¿¡æ¯'
 echo_info '[7].--help æ‰“å°å¸®åŠ©'
 echo_info '**å¦‚éœ€æ‰“å°æ‰€æœ‰ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œåˆ™æ— éœ€åŠ ä»»ä½•é€‰é¡¹'
}

# åˆ¤æ–­æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
# å­˜åœ¨åˆ™åˆ¤æ–­æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ­£ç¡®æ€§
# ä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™ä¼šåˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
if [ -f $DATA_FILE_NAME ]
then
 for line in `cat $DATA_FILE_NAME`
 do
 fun_test_data_format $line
 if test $_TRUE -ne $?
 then
 echo_erro 'å·²å­˜åœ¨çš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ä¸æ­£ç¡®ï¼Œå»ºè®®åˆ é™¤å·²æœ‰çš„é”™è¯¯æ–‡ä»¶ï¼'
 exit
 fi
 done
else
 echo_info 'æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨åˆ›å»º'
 echo '00101:å¼ ä¸‰:ç”·:è®¡ç®—æœº' > $DATA_FILE_NAME
fi

# åŠŸèƒ½é€‰æ‹©
case $1 in
 '-h')
 if test -z "$2"
 then
 head $DATA_FILE_NAME
 else
 head -n $2 $DATA_FILE_NAME
 fi
 ;;
 '-t')
 if test -z "$2"
 then
 tail $DATA_FILE_NAME
 else
 tail -n $2 $DATA_FILE_NAME
 fi
 ;;
 '-o')
 if test $2 == 'num'
 then
 sort --field-separator=":" --key=1 $DATA_FILE_NAME
 else
 sort --field-separator=":" --key=4 $DATA_FILE_NAME
 fi
 ;;
 '-a')
 if test -n "$2"
 then
 student_id=`echo $2|cut -d ':' -f 1`
 if test 1 -eq `grep -c -e "^$student_id:" $DATA_FILE_NAME`
 then
 echo_info 'å­¦ç”Ÿå·²å­˜åœ¨ï¼ï¼'
 echo_info `grep -m 1 -e "^$student_id:" $DATA_FILE_NAME`
 else
 fun_test_data_format $2
 if test $_TRUE -eq $?
 then
 echo $2 >> $DATA_FILE_NAME
 else
 echo_erro 'è¾“å…¥çš„å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯æ ¼å¼ä¸ç¬¦åˆè¦æ±‚ï¼'
 fi
 fi
 else
 echo_erro 'ä¿¡æ¯ä¸å®Œæ•´'
 fi
 ;;
 '-d')
 if test -n "$2"
 then
 if test 1 -eq `grep -c -e "^$2:" $DATA_FILE_NAME`
 then
 read -p 'æ˜¯å¦ç¡®å®šåˆ é™¤[y/n]ï¼š' input
 if test $input == 'yes' -o $input == 'y'
 then
 sed -i "/^$2:/g" $DATA_FILE_NAME
 fi
 else
 echo_erro 'å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯ä¸å­˜åœ¨'
 fi
 else
 echo_erro 'ç¼ºå°‘å­¦å·'
 fi
 ;;
 '-s')
 if test -n "$2"
 then
 if test 1 -eq `grep -c -e "^$2:" $DATA_FILE_NAME`
 then
 echo_info `grep -m 1 -e "^$2:" $DATA_FILE_NAME`
 else
 echo_erro 'å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯ä¸å­˜åœ¨'
 fi
 else
 echo_erro 'ç¼ºå°‘å­¦å·'
 fi
 ;;
 '--help')
 fun_show_help
 ;;
 '')
 cat $DATA_FILE_NAME
 ;;
 *)
 echo_erro 'å‚æ•°é€‰é¡¹é”™è¯¯ï¼Œ--helpæŸ¥çœ‹å¸®åŠ©'
 echo_info '------------------------------'
 fun_show_help
 ;;
esac

import requests as req
from requests_toolbelt.multipart.encoder import MultipartEncoder
import inc.config as conf
import base64
import io

img_file = io.open('../resource/img2.jpg', 'rb')
img_base64 = base64.encodebytes(img_file.read())

# è¯·æ±‚æ•°æ®

multipart = MultipartEncoder(req_data)
headers = {'Content-Type': multipart.content_type}

print(res.json())

img_file.close()

package cn.llzero.entity;

import java.io.Serializable;

public class User implements Serializable {
 private Integer id;

 private String name;

 private String pass;

 private Character sex;

 public Integer getId() {
 return id;
 }

 public User setId(Integer id) {
 this.id = id;
 return this;
 }

 public String getName() {
 return name;
 }

 public User setName(String name) {
 this.name = name;
 return this;
 }

 public String getPass() {
 return pass;
 }

 public User setPass(String pass) {
 this.pass = pass;
 return this;
 }

 public Character getSex() {
 return sex;
 }

 public User setSex(Character sex) {
 this.sex = sex;
 return this;
 }

 @Override
 public String toString() {
 return "User{" +
 "id=" + id +
 ", name='" + name + '\'' +
 ", pass='" + pass + '\'' +
 ", sex=" + sex +
 '}';
 }
}

Criteria cr = session.createCriteria(User.class);
System.out.println(cr.list());

// å¯¹æ ‡å‡†çš„é™åˆ¶
// ä½¿ç”¨addæ–¹æ³•æ¥æ·»åŠ å¯¹æ ‡å‡†çš„é™åˆ¶
// Restrictionsä¸­å®šä¹‰ç›¸å…³é™åˆ¶
cr.add(Restrictions.eq("id", 3));
System.out.println(cr.list());
cr.add(Restrictions.isNull("id"));
cr.add(Restrictions.isNotNull("id"));
cr.add(Restrictions.isEmpty("id");
cr.add(Restrictions.isNotEmpty("id"));
cr.add(Restrictions.ge("id", 10));
cr.add(Restrictions.le("id", 20));
cr.add(Restrictions.gt("id", 30));
cr.add(Restrictions.lt("id", 40)));

// æ¨¡ç³ŠæŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨"%"æˆ–"_"
cr.add(Restrictions.like("id", "5%"));
// å€¼åŒºé—´
cr.add(Restrictions.between("id", 2, 5));

// ANDæˆ–ORæ¡ä»¶
Criterion cr1 = Restrictions.eq("id", 3);
Criterion cr2 = Restrictions.eq("pass", "123456");
System.out.println(cr.add(Restrictions.and(cr1, cr2)).list());
System.out.println(cr.add(Restrictions.or(cr1, cr2)).list());

// åˆ†é¡µ
System.out.println(cr.setFirstResult(2).setMaxResults(2).list());

// æ’åºï¼Œä½¿ç”¨Orderç±»
// æ³¨æ„addOrderæ–¹æ³•
System.out.println(cr.addOrder(Order.desc("id")).list());

public interface Interceptor {
 boolean onLoad(Object var1, Serializable var2, Object[] var3, String[] var4, Type[] var5) throws CallbackException;

 boolean onFlushDirty(Object var1, Serializable var2, Object[] var3, Object[] var4, String[] var5, Type[] var6) throws CallbackException;

 boolean onSave(Object var1, Serializable var2, Object[] var3, String[] var4, Type[] var5) throws CallbackException;

 void onDelete(Object var1, Serializable var2, Object[] var3, String[] var4, Type[] var5) throws CallbackException;

 void onCollectionRecreate(Object var1, Serializable var2) throws CallbackException;

 void onCollectionRemove(Object var1, Serializable var2) throws CallbackException;

 void onCollectionUpdate(Object var1, Serializable var2) throws CallbackException;

 void preFlush(Iterator var1) throws CallbackException;

 void postFlush(Iterator var1) throws CallbackException;

 Boolean isTransient(Object var1);

 int[] findDirty(Object var1, Serializable var2, Object[] var3, Object[] var4, String[] var5, Type[] var6);

 Object instantiate(String var1, EntityMode var2, Serializable var3) throws CallbackException;

 String getEntityName(Object var1) throws CallbackException;

 Object getEntity(String var1, Serializable var2) throws CallbackException;

 void afterTransactionBegin(Transaction var1);

 void beforeTransactionCompletion(Transaction var1);

 void afterTransactionCompletion(Transaction var1);

 /** @deprecated */
 @Deprecated
 String onPrepareStatement(String var1);
}

public class HibernateInterceptor extends EmptyInterceptor {
 @Override
 public void onDelete(Object entity, Serializable id, Object[] state, String[] propertyNames, Type[] types) {
 System.out.println("on delete!");
 super.onDelete(entity, id, state, propertyNames, types);
 }

 @Override
 public boolean onFlushDirty(Object entity, Serializable id, Object[] currentState, Object[] previousState, String[] propertyNames, Type[] types) {
 System.out.println("on flush dirty");
 return super.onFlushDirty(entity, id, currentState, previousState, propertyNames, types);
 }

 @Override
 public boolean onLoad(Object entity, Serializable id, Object[] state, String[] propertyNames, Type[] types) {
 System.out.println("on load");
 return super.onLoad(entity, id, state, propertyNames, types);
 }

 @Override
 public boolean onSave(Object entity, Serializable id, Object[] state, String[] propertyNames, Type[] types) {
 System.out.println("on save");
 return super.onSave(entity, id, state, propertyNames, types);
 }

 @Override
 public void postFlush(Iterator entities) {
 System.out.println("post flush");
 super.postFlush(entities);
 }

 @Override
 public void preFlush(Iterator entities) {
 System.out.println("pre flush");
 super.preFlush(entities);
 }

 @Override
 public Boolean isTransient(Object entity) {
 System.out.println("isTransient");
 return super.isTransient(entity);
 }

 @Override
 public Object instantiate(String entityName, EntityMode entityMode, Serializable id) {
 System.out.println("instantiate");
 return super.instantiate(entityName, entityMode, id);
 }

 @Override
 public int[] findDirty(Object entity, Serializable id, Object[] currentState, Object[] previousState, String[] propertyNames, Type[] types) {
 System.out.println("findDirty");
 return super.findDirty(entity, id, currentState, previousState, propertyNames, types);
 }

 @Override
 public String getEntityName(Object object) {
 System.out.println("getEntityName");
 return super.getEntityName(object);
 }

 @Override
 public Object getEntity(String entityName, Serializable id) {
 System.out.println("getEntity");
 return super.getEntity(entityName, id);
 }

 @Override
 public void afterTransactionBegin(Transaction tx) {
 System.out.println("afterTransactionBegin");
 super.afterTransactionBegin(tx);
 }

 @Override
 public void afterTransactionCompletion(Transaction tx) {
 System.out.println("afterTransactionCompletion");
 super.afterTransactionCompletion(tx);
 }

 @Override
 public void beforeTransactionCompletion(Transaction tx) {
 System.out.println("beforeTransactionCompletion");
 super.beforeTransactionCompletion(tx);
 }

 @Override
 public String onPrepareStatement(String sql) {
 System.out.println("onPrepareStatement");
 return super.onPrepareStatement(sql);
 }

 @Override
 public void onCollectionRemove(Object collection, Serializable key) throws CallbackException {
 System.out.println("onCollectionRemove");
 super.onCollectionRemove(collection, key);
 }

 @Override
 public void onCollectionRecreate(Object collection, Serializable key) throws CallbackException {
 System.out.println("onCollectionRecreate");
 super.onCollectionRecreate(collection, key);
 }

 @Override
 public void onCollectionUpdate(Object collection, Serializable key) throws CallbackException {
 System.out.println("onCollectionUpdate");
 super.onCollectionUpdate(collection, key);
 }
}

#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
/*
**æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ä¸²å¤´æ–‡ä»¶
**ASorb time:201811
*/

//çŠ¶æ€ç 
#define TRUE 1
#define FALSE 0
#define OK 1
#define ERROR 0
#define INFEASIBLE -1
#define OVERFLOW -2
//å‡½æ•°è¿”å›çŠ¶æ€ç ç±»å‹

typedef int Status;
/**ä¸²çš„å †åˆ†é…å­˜å‚¨è¡¨ç¤º**/
typedef struct {
 char *ch;
 int length;
}HString;

//ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªå…¶å€¼ç­‰äºä¸²å¸¸é‡charsçš„ä¸²T
Status StrAssign(HString *T,char *chars){
 int len=0;
 if(T->ch) free(T->ch);
 for(char *c=chars;*c;c++,len++);
 if(!len){
 T->ch = NULL;
 T->length = 0;
 }
 else{
 if(!(T->ch=(char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*len)))
 exit(OVERFLOW);
 for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
 T->ch[i] = chars[i];
 T->length = len;
 }
 return OK;
}
//è¿”å›Sçš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œç§°ä¸ºä¸²çš„é•¿åº¦
int StrLength(HString S){
 return S.length;
}
//ä¸²æ¯”è¾ƒ
int StrCompare(HString S,HString T){
 for(int i=0;i<S.length && i<T.length;i++)
 if(S.ch[i] != T.ch[i])
 return S.ch[i] - T.ch[i];
 return S.length - T.length;
}
//å°†Sæ¸…ä¸ºç©ºä¸²ï¼Œå¹¶é‡Šæ”¾Sçš„ç©ºé—´
Status ClearString(HString *S){
 if(S->ch){
 free(S->ch);
 S->ch = NULL;
 }
 S->length = 0;
 return OK;
}
//ç”¨Tè¿”å›æœ‰S1å’ŒS2è¿æ¥è€Œæˆçš„æ–°ä¸²
Status Concat(HString *T,HString S1,HString S2){
 if(T->ch)free(T->ch);
 if(!(T->ch=(char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*(S1.length+S2.length))))
 exit(OVERFLOW);
 for(int i=0;i<S1.length;i++)
 T->ch[i] = S1.ch[i];
 for(int i=0;i<S2.length;i++)
 T->ch[i+S1.length]=S2.ch[i];
 T->length = S1.length + S2.length;
 return OK;
}
//è¿”å›ä¸²Sçš„ç¬¬posä¸ªå­—ç¬¦èµ·é•¿åº¦ä¸ºlençš„å­ä¸²
Status SubString(HString *Sub,HString S,int pos,int len){
 if(pos<1 || pos>S.length || len<0 || len>S.length-pos+1)
 return ERROR;
 if(Sub->ch){
 free(Sub->ch);
 Sub->length = 0;
 }
 if(!len){
 Sub->ch = NULL;
 Sub->length =0;
 }
 else{
 if(!(Sub->ch=(char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*len)))
 exit(OVERFLOW);
 for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
 Sub->ch[i] = S.ch[pos+i-1];
 Sub->length = len;
 }
 return OK;
}

/**
**å®éªŒ3 001
**ASorb time:201811

#include"DataH.h"
#define MAX_CHARS 200
//è¿”å›å•è¯æ•°é‡
int word_num(HString S) {
 int num = 0;
 int is_word = 0;
 if (S.length == 0)return num;
 for (int i = 0; i < S.length; i++) {
 if (S.ch[i] != ' ')
 is_word = 1;
 if ((S.ch[i] == ' '|| i==S.length-1) && is_word) {
 num++;
 is_word = 0;
 }
 }
 return num;
}
//ç»Ÿè®¡æŸ¥æ‰¾å•è¯çš„æ•°é‡å¹¶è®°å½•ä½ç½®
Status find_word_num(HString S,char chars[],int position[]) {
 int num = 1;
 HString T; T.ch = NULL;
 HString Sub; Sub.ch = NULL;
 char chars_find[MAX_CHARS];
 StrAssign(&T,chars);
 for (int i = 1; i <= S.length - T.length+1; i++) {
 SubString(&Sub, S, i, T.length);
 if (StrCompare(Sub, T) == 0)
 if ((i == 1 || S.ch[i - 2] == ' ') && (i==S.length-T.length+1||S.ch[i+T.length-1]==' ')) {
 position[0]++;
 position[num++] = i;
 }
 }
 ClearString(&Sub);
 ClearString(&T);
 return OK;
}
int main() {
 HString S;S.ch = NULL;
 char chars[MAX_CHARS], chars_find[MAX_CHARS];
 int position[MAX_CHARS + 1] = { 0 }; //0ä½ç½®å­˜å‚¨æ•°é‡ï¼Œå…¶ä½™å­˜å‚¨ä½ç½®
 printf("è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬ï¼ˆ200å­—ç¬¦å†…ï¼‰ï¼š");
 gets_s(chars);
 StrAssign(&S, chars);
 printf("éœ€è¦æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„å•è¯ä¸ºï¼š");
 gets_s(chars_find);
 printf("æ–‡æ®µå•è¯æ•°é‡ä¸ºï¼š%d\n", word_num(S));
 find_word_num(S, chars_find, position);
 printf("æŸ¥æ‰¾å•è¯çš„æ•°é‡ä¸º:%d\n", position[0]);
 if (position[0]) {
 printf("ä½ç½®è®°å½•ä¸ºï¼š\n");
 for (int i = 1;position[i]; i++)
 printf("%4d", position[i]);
 }
 ClearString(&S);
 getchar();
 return 0;
}

END

#include<stdio.h>

/*
**æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ä¸²å¤´æ–‡ä»¶
**ASorb time:201811
*/

//çŠ¶æ€ç 
#define TRUE 1
#define FALSE 0
#define OK 1
#define ERROR 0
#define INFEASIBLE -1
#define OVERFLOW -2
//å‡½æ•°è¿”å›çŠ¶æ€ç ç±»å‹

typedef int Status;
/**ä¸²çš„å †åˆ†é…å­˜å‚¨è¡¨ç¤º**/
typedef struct {
 char *ch;
 int length;
}HString;

//ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªå…¶å€¼ç­‰äºä¸²å¸¸é‡charsçš„ä¸²T
Status StrAssign(HString *T,char *chars){
 int len=0;
 if(T->ch) free(T->ch);
 for(char *c=chars;*c;c++,len++);
 if(!len){
 T->ch = NULL;
 T->length = 0;
 }
 else{
 if(!(T->ch=(char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*len)))
 exit(OVERFLOW);
 for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
 T->ch[i] = chars[i];
 T->length = len;
 }
 return OK;
}
//è¿”å›Sçš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œç§°ä¸ºä¸²çš„é•¿åº¦
int StrLength(HString S){
 return S.length;
}
//ä¸²æ¯”è¾ƒ
int StrCompare(HString S,HString T){
 for(int i=0;i<S.length && i<T.length;i++)
 if(S.ch[i] != T.ch[i])
 return S.ch[i] - T.ch[i];
 return S.length - T.length;
}
//å°†Sæ¸…ä¸ºç©ºä¸²ï¼Œå¹¶é‡Šæ”¾Sçš„ç©ºé—´
Status ClearString(HString *S){
 if(S->ch){
 free(S->ch);
 S->ch = NULL;
 }
 S->length = 0;
 return OK;
}
//ç”¨Tè¿”å›æœ‰S1å’ŒS2è¿æ¥è€Œæˆçš„æ–°ä¸²
Status Concat(HString *T,HString S1,HString S2){
 if(T->ch)free(T->ch);
 if(!(T->ch=(char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*(S1.length+S2.length))))
 exit(OVERFLOW);
 for(int i=0;i<S1.length;i++)
 T->ch[i] = S1.ch[i];
 for(int i=0;i<S2.length;i++)
 T->ch[i+S1.length]=S2.ch[i];
 T->length = S1.length + S2.length;
 return OK;
}
//è¿”å›ä¸²Sçš„ç¬¬posä¸ªå­—ç¬¦èµ·é•¿åº¦ä¸ºlençš„å­ä¸²
Status SubString(HString *Sub,HString S,int pos,int len){
 if(pos<1 || pos>S.length || len<0 || len>S.length-pos+1)
 return ERROR;
 if(Sub->ch){
 free(Sub->ch);
 Sub->length = 0;
 }
 if(!len){
 Sub->ch = NULL;
 Sub->length =0;
 }
 else{
 if(!(Sub->ch=(char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*len)))
 exit(OVERFLOW);
 for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
 Sub->ch[i] = S.ch[pos+i-1];
 Sub->length = len;
 }
 return OK;
}

#include"DataH.h"
#define MAX_CHARS 100
Status key_op(HString S,char m_chars[],char j_chars[]) {
 char m_key[] = { "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz" }; //æ˜æ–‡
 char j_key[] = { "ngzqtcobmuhelkpdawxfyIvrsj" }; //æš—æ–‡
 for (int i = 0; i < S.length; i++) {
 for (int ii = 0; ii < 26; ii++)
 if (S.ch[i] == m_key[ii]) {
 j_chars[i] = j_key[ii];
 break;
 }
 else
 j_chars[i] = S.ch[i];
 for (int ii = 0; ii < 26; ii++)
 if (S.ch[i] == j_key[ii]) {
 m_chars[i] = m_key[ii];
 break;
 }
 else
 m_chars[i] = S.ch[i];
 }
 return OK;
}
int main() {
 HString S; S.ch = NULL;
 char chars[MAX_CHARS], m_chars[MAX_CHARS] = { '\0' }, j_chars[MAX_CHARS] = { '\0' };
 printf("è¾“å…¥éœ€è¦è½¬æ¢çš„å¯†ç ï¼š");
 gets_s(chars);
 StrAssign(&S, chars);
 key_op(S, m_chars, j_chars);
 ClearString(&S);
 printf("ä½ è¾“å…¥çš„keyï¼š%s\n",chars);
 printf("æ˜æ–‡keyï¼š%s\n", m_chars);
 printf("æš—æ–‡keyï¼š%s\n", j_chars);
 getchar();
 return 0;
}

#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>

//çŠ¶æ€ç 
#define TRUE 1
#define FALSE 0
#define OK 1
#define ERROR 0
#define INFEASIBLE -1
#define OVERFLOW -2
//å‡½æ•°è¿”å›çŠ¶æ€ç ç±»å‹
typedef int Status;

çº¿æ€§è¡¨&é¡ºåºè¡¨

/*çº¿æ€§è¡¨.é¡ºåºè¡¨&ç»“æ„&ç®—æ³•*/
typedef int ElemType;

#define LIST_INIT_SIZE 100 //çº¿æ€§è¡¨å­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´çš„åˆå§‹åˆ†é…é‡
#define LISTINCREMENT 10 //çº¿æ€§è¡¨å­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´çš„åˆ†é…å¢é‡
typedef struct {
 ElemType *elem;
 int length; //å½“å‰é•¿åº¦
 int listsize; //å½“å‰åˆ†é…çš„å­˜å‚¨å®¹é‡ï¼ˆä»¥sizeof(ElemType)ä¸ºå•ä½ï¼‰
}SqList;

Status InitList_Sq(SqList *L){
 L->elem = (ElemType*)malloc(sizeof(ElemType)*LIST_INIT_SIZE);
 if (!L->elem) exit(OVERFLOW); //ç©ºé—´åˆ†é…å¤±è´¥
 L->length = 0;
 L->listsize = LIST_INIT_SIZE;
 return OK;
}//æ„é€ ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºçš„çº¿æ€§è¡¨L
Status DestroyList_Sq(SqList *L){
 free(L->elem);
 if (L->elem) return ERROR;
 L->length = 0;
 L->listsize = 0;
 return OK;
}//é”€æ¯çº¿æ€§è¡¨L
Status ClearList_Sq(SqList *L){
 L->length = 0;
 return OK;
}//å°†Lé‡ç½®ä¸ºç©ºè¡¨
Status ListEmpty_Sq(SqList L){
 if (L.length == 0)return TRUE;
 else return FALSE;
}//è‹¥Lä¸ºç©ºè¡¨ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›TRUE,å¦åˆ™è¿”å›FALSE
int ListLength_Sq(SqList L){
 return L.length;
}//è¿”å›Lä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°
Status GetElem_Sq(SqList L,int i, ElemType *e){
 if (i<1 || i>L.length)return ERROR;
 *e = *(L.elem + i - 1);
 return OK;
}//ç”¨eè¿”å›Lä¸­ç¬¬iä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„å€¼
int LocateElem_Sq(SqList L, ElemType e, Status compare(ElemType,ElemType)){
 int i = 0;
 while (i < L.length){
 if (compare(*(L.elem + i), e))
 return i + 1;
 i++;
 }
 return 0;
}//è¿”å›Lä¸­ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä¸eæ»¡è¶³å…³ç³»compare()çš„æ•°æ®å…ƒç´ çš„ä½åºã€‚è‹¥è¿™æ ·çš„å…ƒç´ ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›å€¼ä¸º0
Status PriorElem_Sq(SqList L, ElemType cur_e, ElemType *pre_e){
 for (int i = 1; i < L.length; i++){
 if (*(L.elem + i) == cur_e){
 *pre_e = *(L.elem + i - 1);
 return TRUE;
 }
 }
 return FALSE;
}//ç”¨pre_eè¿”å›cur_eçš„å‰é©±
Status NextElem_Sq(SqList L, ElemType cur_e, ElemType *next_e){
 for (int i = 0; i < L.length - 1; i++){
 if (*(L.elem + i) == cur_e){
 *next_e = *(L.elem + i + 1);
 return TRUE;
 }
 }
 return FALSE;
}//ç”¨next_eè¿”å›cur_eçš„åç»§
Status ListInsert_Sq(SqList *L, int i, ElemType e){
 if (i<1 || i>L->length + 1)return ERROR;
 if (L->length >= L->listsize){//ç©ºé—´ä¸è¶³ï¼Œå¢åŠ ç©ºé—´
 L->elem = (ElemType*)realloc(L->elem, sizeof(ElemType)*(L->listsize + LISTINCREMENT));
 if (!L->elem)exit(OVERFLOW); //åˆ†é…å¤±è´¥
 L->listsize += LISTINCREMENT;
 }
 for (int ii = L->length; ii >= i; ii--){//iä½ä»¥åå¼€å§‹åç§»
 *(L->elem + ii) = *(L->elem + ii - 1);
 }
 *(L->elem + i - 1) = e;
 L->length++;
 return OK;
}//åœ¨Lä¸­çš„ç¬¬iä¸ªä½ç½®å‰æ’å…¥eï¼ŒLçš„é•¿åº¦åŠ 1
Status ListDelete_Sq(SqList *L, int i, ElemType *e){
 if (i < 1 || i>L->length)return ERROR;
 *e = *(L->elem + i - 1);
 for (int ii = i - 1; ii < L->length - 1; ii++){//iä½ä»¥åå‰ç§»è¦†ç›–
 *(L->elem + ii) = *(L->elem + ii + 1);
 }
 L->length--;

}//åˆ é™¤Lçš„ç¬¬içš„æ•°æ®å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå¹¶ç”¨eè¿”å›å…¶å€¼ï¼ŒLçš„é•¿åº¦å‡1
Status ListTraverse_Sq(SqList L, Status visit(ElemType*)){
 if (L.length == 0)return ERROR;

}//ä¾æ¬¡å¯¹Lä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªæ•°æ®å…ƒç´ è°ƒç”¨visit()

typedef struct LNode{

}*Link,Position;
typedef struct{

 int len; //æŒ‡ç¤ºçº¿æ€§è¡¨å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸ªæ•°
}LinkList;
Status MakeNode(Link *p, ElemType e){
 (*p) = (Link)malloc(sizeof(Position));
 if (!(*p))return ERROR;
 (*p)->data = e;
 (*p)->next = NULL;
 return OK;
}//åˆ†é…ç”±pæŒ‡å‘çš„å€¼ä¸ºeçš„ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›OKï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›ERROR
void FreeNode(Link p){

Status InitList_L(LinkList *L){
 L->head = (Link)malloc(sizeof(Position));
 if (!L->head)exit(OVERFLOW); //ç©ºé—´åˆ†é…å¤±è´¥
 L->head->next = NULL;
 L->tail = L->head;

Status DestroyList_L(LinkList *L){

 while (L->tail){
 L->head->next = L->tail->next;
 free(L->tail);
 L->tail = L->head->next;
 }
 free(L->head);

}//é”€æ¯Lï¼ŒLä¸åœ¨å­˜åœ¨
Status ClearList_L(LinkList *L){
 L->tail = L->head->next;
 while (L->tail){
 L->head->next = L->tail->next;
 free(L->tail);
 L->tail = L->head->next;
 }
 L->tail = L->head;
 L->len = 0;
 return OK;
}//é‡ç½®Lä¸ºç©ºè¡¨ï¼Œé‡Šæ”¾åŸé“¾è¡¨çš„ç»“ç‚¹ç©ºé—´
Status InsFirst_L(Link h, Link s){

 h->next = s;
 return OK;
}//å·²çŸ¥hæŒ‡å‘çº¿æ€§è¡¨å¤´ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œå°†sæ‰€æŒ‡ç»“ç‚¹æ’å…¥åœ¨ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ä¹‹å‰
Status DelFirst_L(Link h, Position *q){
 Link p = h->next;
 if (!p)return ERROR; //è¡¨ç©º
 h->next = p->next;
 *q = *p;
 free(p);
 return OK;
}//å·²çŸ¥hæŒ‡å‘çº¿æ€§è¡¨å¤´ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œåˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹å¹¶ä»¥qè¿”å›
Status Append_L (LinkList *L, Link s){
 L->tail->next = s;
 while (s){
 L->tail = s;
 L->len++;
 s = s->next;
 }
 return OK;
}//æŠŠsæ‰€æŒ‡æŒ‡é’ˆæ¥åœ¨Lçš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ä¹‹åï¼Œå¹¶æ”¹å˜é“¾è¡¨Lçš„å°¾æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘æ–°çš„å°¾ç»“ç‚¹
Status Remove_L(LinkList *L, Position *q){
 Link p = L->tail;
 if (L->head == L->tail)return ERROR; //è¡¨ç©º
 *q = *(L->tail);
 L->tail = L->head;
 while (L->tail->next != p)
 L->tail = L->tail->next;
 free(p);
 L->len--;
 return OK;
}//åˆ é™¤çº¿æ€§è¡¨Lä¸­çš„å°¾ç»“ç‚¹å¹¶ä»¥è¿”å›ï¼Œæ”¹å˜é“¾è¡¨Lçš„å°¾æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘æ–°çš„å°¾ç»“ç‚¹
Status InsBefore_L(LinkList *L, Link p, Link s){
 Link q = L->head->next;
 while (q->next != p&&q->next != NULL)
 q = q->next;
 q->next = s;
 s->next = p;
 p = s;
 L->len++;
 return OK;
}//å·²çŸ¥pæŒ‡å‘çº¿æ€§è¡¨Lä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œå°†sæ‰€æŒ‡ç»“ç‚¹æ’å…¥åœ¨pæ‰€æŒ‡ç»“ç‚¹å‰
Status InsAfter_L(LinkList *L, Link p, Link s){
 Link q = p->next;
 p->next = s;
 s->next = q;
 if (p == L->tail)
 L->tail = s;
 L->len++;
 return OK;
}//å·²çŸ¥pæŒ‡å‘çº¿æ€§è¡¨Lä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œå°†sæ‰€æŒ‡ç»“ç‚¹æ’å…¥åœ¨pæ‰€æŒ‡ç»“ç‚¹å
Status SetCurElem_L(Link p, ElemType e){
 p->data = e;
 return OK;
}//å·²çŸ¥pæŒ‡å‘çº¿æ€§è¡¨ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œç”¨eæ›´æ–°pæ‰€æŒ‡ç»“ç‚¹çš„å€¼
ElemType GetCurElem_L(Link p){
 return p->data;
}//å·²çŸ¥pæŒ‡å‘çº¿æ€§è¡¨ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œè¿”å›pæ‰€æŒ‡ç»“ç‚¹æ•°æ®å…ƒç´ çš„å€¼
Status ListEmpty_L(LinkList L){
 if (L.len == 0)return TRUE;
 else return FALSE;
}//è‹¥çº¿æ€§è¡¨Lä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™æ”¾å›TRUEï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›FALSE
int ListLength_L(LinkList L){
 return L.len;
}//è¿”å›çº¿æ€§è¡¨Lä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°
Position* GetHead_L(LinkList L){
 return L.head;
}//è¿”å›Lä¸­å¤´ç»“ç‚¹ä½ç½®
Position* GetLast_L(LinkList L){
 return L.tail;
}//è¿”å›çº¿æ€§è¡¨Lä¸­æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ä½ç½®
Position* PriorPos_L(LinkList L, Link p){
 Link q = L.head->next;
 while (q->next != p&&q != NULL)
 q = q->next;
 return q;
}//å·²çŸ¥pæŒ‡å‘Lä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œè¿”å›å…¶å‰é©±
Position* NextPos_L(LinkList L, Link p){
 return p->next;
}//å·²çŸ¥pæŒ‡å‘çº¿æ€§è¡¨Lä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œè¿”å›pæ‰€æŒ‡ç»“ç‚¹çš„ç›´æ¥åç»§ä½ç½®
Status LocatePos_L(LinkList L, int i, Link *p){
 if (i<1 || i>L.len)return ERROR;
 *p = L.head;
 for (i; i >= 1; i--){
 *p= (*p)->next;
 }
 return OK;
}//è¿”å›pæŒ‡ç¤ºçº¿æ€§è¡¨Lä¸­ç¬¬iä¸ªç»“ç‚¹çš„ä½ç½®å¹¶è¿”å›OKï¼Œiä¸åˆæ³•è¿”å›ERROR
Position* LocateElem_L(LinkList L, ElemType e, Status(*compare)(ElemType, ElemType)){
 Link p = L.head;
 while (p){
 if ((*compare)(e, p->data))
 return p;
 p = p->next;
 }
 return NULL;
}//è¿”å›çº¿æ€§è¡¨ä¸­ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä¸eæ»¡è¶³å‡½æ•°compare()åˆ¤å®šå…³ç³»çš„å…ƒç´ çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰è¿”å›NULL
Status ListTraverse_L(LinkList L, Status(*visit)(ElemType)){
 Link p = L.head;
 while (p){
 if (!(*visit)(p->data))return ERROR;
 p = p->next;
 }
 return OK;
}//ä¾æ¬¡å¯¹Lçš„æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°visit()ã€‚ä¸€æ—¦å¤±è´¥ï¼Œåˆ™æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥

typedef int SElemType;

#define STACK_INIT_SIZE 100 //å­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´åˆå§‹åˆ†é…é‡
#define STACKINCREMENT 10 //å­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´åˆ†é…å¢é‡

typedef struct{
 SElemType *base; //åœ¨æ ˆæ„é€ ä¹‹å‰å’Œé”€æ¯ä¹‹åï¼Œbaseçš„å€¼ä¸ºNULL
 SElemType *top; //æ ˆé¡¶æŒ‡é’ˆ
 int stacksize; //å½“å‰å·²åˆ†é…çš„å­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´ï¼Œä»¥å…ƒç´ ä¸ºå•ä½
}SqStack;

Status InitStack(SqStack *S){
 S->base = (SElemType*)malloc(sizeof(SElemType)*STACK_INIT_SIZE);
 if (!S->base)exit(OVERFLOW); //åˆ†é…å¤±è´¥
 S->top = S->base;
 S->stacksize = STACK_INIT_SIZE;
 return OK;
}//æ„é€ ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºæ ˆS
Status DestroyStack(SqStack *S){
 free(S->base);
 S->base = NULL; S->top = NULL;
 S->stacksize = 0;
 return OK;
}//é”€æ¯æ ˆSï¼ŒSä¸å†å­˜åœ¨
Status ClearStack(SqStack *S){
 S->top = S->base;
 return OK;
}//æŠŠæ ˆSç½®ç©º
Status StackEmpty(SqStack S){
 if (S.base == S.top)return TRUE;
 else return FALSE;
}//æ ˆä¸ºç©ºè¿”å›TRUEï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›FALSE
int StackLength(SqStack S){
 int SElem_num = 0;
 SElem_num = S.top - S.base;
 return SElem_num;
}//æ”¾å›Sçš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå³æ ˆçš„é•¿åº¦
Status GetTop(SqStack S, SElemType *e){
 if (StackEmpty(S))return ERROR; //æ ˆç©º
 *e = *(S.top - 1);
 return OK;
}//è‹¥æ ˆä¸ç©ºï¼Œåˆ™ç”¨eè¿”å›Sçš„æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›OKï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›ERROR
Status Push(SqStack *S, SElemType e){
 if (S->top - S->base >= S->stacksize){
 //æ ˆæ»¡ï¼Œè¿½åŠ ç©ºé—´
 S->base = (SElemType*)realloc(S->base, sizeof(SElemType)*(S->stacksize + STACKINCREMENT));
 if (!S->base)exit(OVERFLOW); //åˆ†é…å¤±è´¥
 S->top = S->base + S->stacksize;
 S->stacksize += STACKINCREMENT;
 }
 *S->top ++ = e;
 return OK;
}//æ’å…¥å…ƒç´ eä¸ºæ–°çš„æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ 
Status Pop(SqStack *S, SElemType *e){
 if (StackEmpty(*S))return ERROR; //æ ˆç©º
 *e = * -- S->top;
 return OK;
}//è‹¥æ ˆä¸ç©ºï¼Œåˆ™åˆ é™¤Sçš„æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ï¼Œç”¨eè¿”å›å…¶å€¼ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›OKï¼›å¦åˆ™è¿”å›ERROR
Status StackTraverse(SqStack S, Status(*visit)(SElemType *e)){
 if (StackEmpty(S))return ERROR; //æ ˆç©º
 for (int i = 0; S.base + i < S.top; i++)
 if(!(*visit)(S.base + i))return ERROR;
 return OK;
}//ä»æ ˆä½ä¾æ¬¡å¯¹æ ˆä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°visit()ã€‚ä¸€æ—¦visit()å¤±è´¥ï¼Œåˆ™æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥

/*å•é“¾é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œé˜Ÿåˆ—çš„é“¾å¼å­˜å‚¨ç»“æ„*/
typedef int QElemType;

typedef struct QNode{
 QElemType data;
 struct QNode *next;
}QNode,*QueuePtr;
typedef struct{
 QueuePtr front; //é˜Ÿå¤´æŒ‡é’ˆ
 QueuePtr rear; //é˜Ÿå°¾æŒ‡é’ˆ
}LinkQueue;

Status InitQueue(LinkQueue *Q){
 Q->front = (QueuePtr)malloc(sizeof(QNode));
 if (!Q->front)exit(OVERFLOW); //ç©ºé—´åˆ†é…å¤±è´¥
 Q->rear = Q->front;
 return OK;
}//æ„é€ ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºé˜Ÿåˆ—
Status DestroyQueue(LinkQueue *Q){
 while (Q->front){
 Q->rear = Q->front->next;
 free(Q->front);
 Q->front = Q->rear;
 }
 return OK;
}//é”€æ¯é˜Ÿåˆ—Qï¼ŒQä¸åœ¨å­˜åœ¨
Status ClearQueue(LinkQueue *Q){
 QueuePtr p = Q->front;
 while (p){
 Q->rear = p->next;
 free(p); //é€ä¸ªé‡Šæ”¾ç©ºé—´
 p = Q->rear;
 }
 Q->rear = Q->front; //ç½®ç©º
 return OK;
}//å°†Qæ¸…ä¸ºç©ºé˜Ÿåˆ—
Status QueueEmpty(LinkQueue Q){
 if (Q.rear == Q.front)return TRUE;
 else return FALSE;
}//è‹¥é˜Ÿåˆ—Qä¸ºç©ºé˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›TRUEï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›FALSE
int QueueLength(LinkQueue Q){
 int QueueL = 0;
 QueueL = Q.rear - Q.front;
 return QueueL;
}//è¿”å›Qçš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå³ä¸ºé˜Ÿåˆ—çš„é•¿åº¦
Status GetHead(LinkQueue Q, QElemType *e){
 if (QueueEmpty(Q)) return ERROR; //é˜Ÿç©º
 *e = Q.front->next->data;
 return OK;
}//è‹¥eä¸ç©ºï¼Œç”¨eè¿”å›Qé˜Ÿå¤´å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›OKï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›ERROR
Status DeQueue(LinkQueue *Q, QElemType *e){
 QueuePtr p = NULL;
 if (QueueEmpty(*Q))return ERROR;
 p = Q->front->next;
 Q->front->next = p->next;
 *e = p->data;
 if (Q->rear == p)Q->rear = Q->front;
 free(p);
 return OK;
}//è‹¥eä¸ç©ºï¼Œåˆ™åˆ é™¤Qçš„é˜Ÿå¤´å…ƒç´ ï¼Œç”¨eè¿”å›å…¶å€¼ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›OKï¼Œå¦åˆ™ERROR
Status QueueTraverse(LinkQueue Q, Status visit(QElemType*)){
 QueuePtr p;
 if (QueueEmpty(Q))return ERROR;
 p = Q.front->next;
 for (int i = QueueLength(Q); i > 0; i--){
 if (!visit(&(p->data)))return ERROR;
 p = p->next;
 }
 return OK;
}//ä»é˜Ÿå¤´åˆ°é˜Ÿå°¾ï¼Œä¾æ¬¡å¯¹Qçš„æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°visit()ï¼Œå¤±è´¥åˆ™è¿”å›ERROR
